categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Bannos was a male Human who served as a Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

During 3640 BBY, Lord Bannos was among the Sith forces who, under the command of Dark Councilors Darth Hadra and Darth Acharon, was holding off the Republic push on the Legislature Building of Corellia. During the attack he was killed by a Republic spacer.
